#summary Short Tutorial on how to use TortoiseSVN to get the latest sources of TibiaAPI
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

 # Download and install TortoiseSVN from [http://tortoisesvn.net/downloads]
 # Create an empty folder named KedrahCore
 # Open the folder, right-click on a blank area, and select SVN Checkout...
 # Wait 20 seconds and you will have all the Source Codes and the latest Documentation!
